description: A Flutter widget defining a swipeable, animated card component (`StoryCard`) for displaying story content with Tinder-like interactions, including gestures, animations, and styling.

classes.name: StoryCard
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing a swipeable story display card with interactive animations and gesture handling.

classes.name: _StoryCardState
classes.description: State class managing gesture interactions, animation states, and rendering for `StoryCard`.

classes.name: _DecisionHint
classes.description: A widget showing animated 'LIKE' or 'NOPE' hint badges during swipe gestures.

methods.name: _onPanStart
methods.description: Starts gesture handling, prevents gesture if dismissing.

methods.name: _onPanUpdate
methods.description: Updates drag offset during user drag.

methods.name: _onPanEnd
methods.description: Determines if swipe decision threshold is passed and triggers animations and callbacks accordingly.

methods.name: _animateBackToOrigin
methods.description: Animates the card back to the original position if no decision threshold is met.

methods.name: _relativeTimeString
methods.description: Formats the story's creation time into a relative string like '3h ago' or a date.

methods.name: _buildCardContent
methods.description: Builds the UI content of the story card, including header, content, and footer.
